ThingDef.Name: VOV_Gryphon_Torrent_Bolter_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Gryphon-Torrent support bolter
ThingDef.description: By taking a Gryphon bolter and adding a bipod, a high-capacity drum magazine and slightly increasing the rate of fire, the Vagar warsmiths have created the Gryphon-Torrent support bolter, which is intended for providing suppressive fire against large groups of enemies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona Gryphon-Sprinter bolter
ThingDef.description: Equipped with a collimator sight and a muzzle guard, this version of the Gryphon bolter is customized for close-range combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VOV_Garm_Bolter_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Garm bolter
ThingDef.description: While similar to the Gryphon in its appearance, the Garm light bolter is very different mechanically. The most important difference is the presence of a recoil compensator, making the gun easier to wield, but also noticeably heavier.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VOV_Garm_Sprinter_Bolter_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Garm-Sprinter bolter
ThingDef.description: Like most other Sprinter variants, this Garm bolter is equipped with a collimator sight and a vertical front grip to aid in close-range combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VOV_Garm_Torrent_Bolter_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Garm-Torrent bolter
ThingDef.description: More of an experiment than a proper weapon, this Garm bolter is fitted with a helical magazine. Ultimately, the Vagar decided that drum magazines are a better option, so few of these weapons were ever made. Still, it is a potent support weapon, able to lay down suppressive fire for an extended amount of time.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VOV_Gargoyle_StormBolter_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Gargoyle stormbolter
ThingDef.description: With a pair of barrels pointing towards the enemy, at first glance the Gargoyle stormbolter might look like a pair of Gryphon bolters strapped together. However, it is a completely different weapon: by using a mechanism where firing one of the chambers reloads the other, the Gargoyle achieves a significantly higher rate of fire. It is primarily designed for brutal close-range combat aboard spaceships, where its low effective range is a small price to pay for its significant firepower.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VOV_Barghest_BPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Barghest bolt pistol
ThingDef.description: The Barghest bolt pistol is one of the most popular sidearms carried by the Vagar. It is light (for a bolter), easy to carry and provides firepower above that of most other pistols.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VOV_Barghest_Snapper_BPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Barghest-Snapper bolt pistol
ThingDef.description: The Snapper version of the Barghest bolt pistol features a barrel so short, that you can easily see the bolt in the chamber. Sometimes called "the powderburner" for its tendency to spray still-burning gunpowder with every shot, it has become a favourite of many naval officers and duelists, as it can be quickly drawn in a middle of a melee fight to deliver an unexpected shot to the opponent's chest.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VOV_Bodak_BPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Bodak bolt pistol
ThingDef.description: An exquisitely crafted version of the Barghest bolt pistol, the Bodak is superior to it in almost every way. The handle is carved from a single piece of a Thrumbo horn and the slide has been engraved with a Vagar take on an ancient proverb: "If you want peace - prepare for war".\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VOV_Erinyes_BCaliver_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Erinyes bolt caliver
ThingDef.description: Sophisticated even for Vagar weapons, the Erinyes bolt caliver uses a complex mechanism that allows it to fire two shots at a tremendous rate, while delaying the impact of the recoil. This allows for an extremely tight grouping of hits and lets the Erinyes punch way above its weight.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity.
